CustomField.description: To capture the language code from Contact.
CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'English', 'en_US', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'Chinese', 'zh_CN', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'French', 'fr', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'German', 'de', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'Italian', 'it', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'Japanese', 'ja', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'Korean', 'ko', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'Portuguese', 'pt_BR', IF(TEXT(Contact.Preferred_Language__c) = 'Spanish', 'es', '') ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Preferred Language
